Package it.polimi.se2018.model

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.Map
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    class Map contains all the method to interact with the map
    Author:
    Andrea Micucci, Anton Ghobryal

    • Constructor Detail

      • Map

        public Map​(java.lang.String glassWindowName,
           int difficulty,
           int row,
           int column)
    throws notValidMatrixException
        class constructor initialize the object Map type
        Parameters:
        glassWindowName - name of the matrix, refers to the corrispondent card
        difficulty - level of difficulty of the matrix
        row - number of row of the matrix
        column - number of column of the matrix
        Throws:
        notValidMatrixException - when the values of row and column are not valid to construct the matrix

      • valueAlreadyExistInColumn

        public boolean valueAlreadyExistInColumn​(int column,
                                         int value)
                                  throws notValidCellException
        method that verify if a number exist already in a column of the matrix
        Parameters:
        column - of the matrix where you want to search the number
        value - that you are searching for
        Returns:
        a boolean that is true if value already exist in the column of matrix, else false
        Throws:
        notValidCellException - when the indexes of the row and the column not respect the interval number of matrix.
